question: When was the Superman comic strip pulled?
sentence: During World War II , the War Department asked for dailies of the Superman comic strip to be pulled in April 1945 which depicted Lex Luthor bombarding Superman with the radiation from a cyclotron , as it violated wartime voluntary censorship guidelines meant to help conceal the Manhattan Project .
